description: Kaguya finally gets to go window shopping and watches vigilantly for her chance to befriend Shirogane’s sister, Kei. While the Fujiwara sisters get in the way, she eventually manages to position herself next to Kei. But then, she can only see Shirogane’s resemblance in Kei’s profile, making her heart beat wildly out of control. Kaguya still decides to take the opportunity to figure out what she should give Shirogane for his birthday when Kei mutters that she isn’t very close to her brother. What secrets will Kei spill about Shirogane?

titles.title: Kaguya Wants to Know / Kaguya Wants to Give a Gift / Chika Fujiwara Wants to Confirm It
Kaguya veut demander / Kaguya veut offrir / Fujiwara Chika veut vérifier
Kaguya-sama wa Kikidashitai / Kaguya-sama wa Okuritai / Fujiwara Chika wa Tashikametai
كاغويا تريد أن تعرف / كاغويا تريد تقديم هدية / فوجيوارا تريد أن تتأكد
かぐや様は聞き出したい / かぐや様は贈りたい / 藤原千花は確かめたい
